name: FetchMessageDeliveries
description:
Retrieve a list of message deliveries and their metrics.

This tool retrieves a list of message deliveries, including metrics, within a specified time range in your workspace. Use it to analyze message performance over the most recent six months or a defined period. If no specific time range is provided, it defaults to the last six months.

parameters.name: page_token
parameters.description: The token to fetch the specified page of delivery results.

value_schema.description: The token for the page of results you want to return. Responses contain a `next` property. Use this property as the `start` value to return the next page of results.

parameters.name: results_per_page_limit
parameters.description: Specifies the maximum number of results to retrieve per page.

value_schema.description: The maximum number of results you want to retrieve per page.

parameters.name: item_type_for_metrics
parameters.description: Specify the item type to return metrics for, such as 'email', 'webhook', 'twilio', 'slack', 'push', or 'in_app'. Leave empty for all types.

value_schema.description: The type of item you want to return metrics for. When empty, the response contains metrics for all possible types.

parameters.name: desired_metrics
parameters.description: Specifies the metrics to retrieve. Options include: attempted, sent, delivered, opened, clicked, converted, bounced, spammed, unsubscribed, dropped, failed, undeliverable.

value_schema.description: Determines the metric(s) you want to return.

parameters.name: filter_by_campaign_id
parameters.description: The ID of the campaign to filter message deliveries. Use this to retrieve data for a specific campaign only.

value_schema.description: The campaign you want to filter for.

parameters.name: filter_by_newsletter_id
parameters.description: An integer representing the ID of the newsletter to filter deliveries for.

value_schema.description: The newsletter you want to filter for.

parameters.name: filter_by_action_id
parameters.description: Specify the action ID to filter the message deliveries. This narrows the results to messages associated with the given action.

value_schema.description: The action you want to filter for.

parameters.name: beginning_timestamp
parameters.description: The beginning timestamp in Unix format for your query. Returns deliveries created after this time.

value_schema.description: The beginning timestamp for your query.

parameters.name: ending_timestamp_for_query
parameters.description: The ending timestamp for your query. If not specified, it defaults to the current time.

value_schema.description: The ending timestamp for your query.

parameters.name: return_drafts_only
parameters.description: Set to true to return drafts instead of active or sent messages.

value_schema.description: If true, your request returns drafts rather than active/sent messages.

metadata.description: Tools that enable LLMs to interact directly with the Customer.io App API

parameters.name: start
parameters.description: The token for the page of results you want to return. Responses contain a `next` property. Use this property as the `start` value to return the next page of results.

value_schema.description: The token for the page of results you want to return. Responses contain a `next` property. Use this property as the `start` value to return the next page of results.

parameters.name: limit
parameters.description: The maximum number of results you want to retrieve per page.

value_schema.description: The maximum number of results you want to retrieve per page.

parameters.name: type
parameters.description: The type of item you want to return metrics for. When empty, the response contains metrics for all possible types.

value_schema.description: The type of item you want to return metrics for. When empty, the response contains metrics for all possible types.

parameters.name: metric
parameters.description: Determines the metric(s) you want to return.

value_schema.description: Determines the metric(s) you want to return.

parameters.name: drafts
parameters.description: If true, your request returns drafts rather than active/sent messages.

value_schema.description: If true, your request returns drafts rather than active/sent messages.

parameters.name: campaign_id
parameters.description: The campaign you want to filter for.

value_schema.description: The campaign you want to filter for.

parameters.name: newsletter_id
parameters.description: The newsletter you want to filter for.

value_schema.description: The newsletter you want to filter for.

parameters.name: action_id
parameters.description: The action you want to filter for.

value_schema.description: The action you want to filter for.

value_schema.description: The beginning timestamp for your query.

parameters.description: The ending timestamp for your query.

value_schema.description: The ending timestamp for your query.
